code: @Override public RetrievableStateHandle<T> store(T state) throws Exception {     Exception latestException = null.     for (int attempt = 0. attempt < 10. attempt++) {         Path filePath = getNewFilePath().         try (FSDataOutputStream outStream = fs.create(filePath, FileSystem.WriteMode.NO_OVERWRITE)) {             InstantiationUtil.serializeObject(outStream, state).             return new RetrievableStreamStateHandle<T>(filePath, outStream.getPos()).         } catch (Exception e) {             latestException = e.         }     }     throw new Exception("Could not open output stream for state backend", latestException). }
private Path getNewFilePath() {     return new Path(rootPath, FileUtils.getRandomFilename(prefix)). }
